channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ronin
channel.description:
#[color=#f4b342]The Ronin (Neutral Wildcard)[/color] _Immune to Conversion_
**Passive Ability: Bushido** If you choose not to use your abilities tonight, you will meditate and recover a usage of a random night ability
**Passive Ability: Shinto** The Gods will reveal to you how somebody was killed previously at the beginning of each night.
**Night Ability 1: Nukiuchi (2 uses)** Draw your blade and duel your target tonight. You will kill your target but because you have respect those of Royality, you will not harm those of Royal Blood. (Still counted as using ability)
**Night Ability 2: Kyudo (2 uses)** Fire your bow and injure your target tonight. If they had immunity, they lose it the following night. If they had no immunity, they will have to recover and will not be able to speak during the day.
**Day Ability 1: Zen (1 use)** Meditate during the day. You won't be able to speak but you will be immune to day abilities.
**_Goal: Survive to the end._**
**Lore:** "Without my Master, I am alone. Now, I seek a path of redemption, through this chaotic time."
The Ronin, a master-less samurai from the Eastern lands. Came all the way to Adiart to seek redemption for his fallen Master. Using various teachings from the Samurai way, he must learn to survive and adapt in a war-torn environment. Only then can he return to the Eastern lands.
There are rumours that he communicates with the Gods to learn of the fate of others around him. Among the rumours are that he possesses a mighty blade in which he uses for duels. He also carries with him a strong oak bow, and with him, Kyudo, Way of the Bow, ancient teachings from the Samurai.
Many Samurai studied Bushido when training the Way of the Warrior. With this, he would be permitted to carry out more challenges with his blade and his bow. Aside his tough training and his ancient ways, he can very peaceful. He sits silently in Zen and nobody would bother him in fear of his rage.
# [color=yellow]For Forum of Lies[/color]
># [color=white]**The [/color][color=red]Ron[/color][color=white]in** (Neutral Wildcard)[/color] > You are Immune to Conversion > **Passive Ability: Bushido** > Recover a random Night Ability if you stay in your room > **Passive Ability: Shinto** > You will be told how somebody was killed at the beginning of each night. > **Night Ability: Nukiuchi** > Duel your target. Kills them unless Royal Blood. - 2 uses > **Night Ability: Kyudo** > Fire your bow. Injures your target so they can't vote, however, if night immune, they lose it for 1 night. - 2 uses > **Day Ability: Zen** > Meditate. Lose your ability to speak but become immune to day abilities. - 1 use > **Goal: Survive**

item.description:

Instead of it telling you during Death callouts, it’ll tell you at the beginning of the next Night Phase, that way, the Ronin can’t be like “Hey guys, he died by Reaper” and be proven or whatever.
